title: Royce Value Trust Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for RVT - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Royce Value Trust Inc (Symbol: RVT) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $13.60, changing hands as high as $13.85 per share. Royce Value Trust Inc shares are currently trading up about 2.8% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of RVT shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
